intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: Where do you play with your friends?
Do you have brothers or sisters?
What is your favorite family activity?

respond_situations.starter_line: What would you like to drink?

respond_situations.description: You are in a clothing store. You see a shirt you like.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You need to order a drink.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at a park. You want to ask someone to take a photo. ..
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: I like to go swimming. I swim in the pool. The water is cool. I go with my friends. We have fun together.

monologue.topic: Talk about your town or city

follow_up_questions.question: What is the name of your town?
What do you like about your town?
Who do you live with in your town?
